summary: Build EdenMind, an AI app that identifies plant health problems and provides cure/treatment solutions plus ongoing care instructions based on user-provided plant information.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Botanical wordmark logo reading “EdenMind” with a minimal leaf/seedling motif, flat vector style, transparent background (edenmind-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Soft botanical hero/banner illustration with leaves/houseplant silhouette, warm neutral background, no text (edenmind-hero.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create the EdenMind app core flow: collect plant information from the user (plant type/name, environment, watering habits, visible symptoms) and generate a clear diagnosis summary plus a cure/treatment plan and ongoing care instructions.

Build the results UI to present the EdenMind output in a readable, actionable format with sections for: Diagnosis, Why this is likely, Treatment plan (step-by-step), and Ongoing care (do/don’t checklist).

Add a coherent visual theme for EdenMind and apply it consistently across the app (typography, spacing, color palette, components). Use an earthy botanical style (greens, warm neutrals) and avoid blue/purple as primary colors.
Generate and include basic static brand/hero imagery for EdenMind and render it from frontend static assets.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create EdenMind AI app that takes plant info from user, diagnoses issues, and returns cure/treatment solutions and care instructions.
Implement a deterministic, on-chain 'AI-like' plant health analyzer in Motoko that maps user-provided symptoms and care context to likely issues and produces structured recommendations.
